languages.text: {n}Мужчина бросает на вас заинтригованный взгляд.{/n} "Интересная точка зрения. Однако позвольте дать совет: ради вашего же благополучия вам надлежит облекать свои мысли в более богобоязненные формы. Подобная небрежность в словах некоторыми людьми может быть сочтена свидетельством недостаточного трепета перед Богом-Императором, Повелителем Человечества".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мужчина бросает на вас заинтригованный взгляд.{/n} "Интересная точка зрения. Однако позвольте дать совет: ради вашего же благополучия вам надлежит облекать свои мысли в более богобоязненные формы. Подобная небрежность в словах некоторыми людьми может быть сочтена свидетельством недостаточного трепета перед Богом-Императором, Повелителем Человечества".

languages.text: {n}The man casts an intrigued eye over you.{/n} "An interesting perspective. However, allow me to offer you a bit of advice: in the interests of your own well-being, you should frame your thoughts with greater piety. Demonstrating such a lack of care when choosing your words might be viewed by certain people as evidence of insufficient trepidation before the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина бросает на вас заинтригованный взгляд.{/n} "Интересная точка зрения. Однако позвольте дать совет: ради вашего же благополучия вам надлежит облекать свои мысли в более богобоязненные формы. Подобная небрежность в словах некоторыми людьми может быть сочтена свидетельством недостаточного трепета перед Богом-Императором, Повелителем Человечества".

traits.locale_text: {n}The man casts an intrigued eye over you.{/n} "An interesting perspective. However, allow me to offer you a bit of advice: in the interest of your own well-being, you should frame your thoughts with greater piety. Such carelessness in the choice of words might be viewed by certain people as evidence of your insufficient trepidation before your Master God-Emperor."

Such carelessness in the choice of words might be viewed by certain people as evidence of your insufficient trepidation before your Master God-Emperor."

Demonstrating such a lack of care when choosing your words might be viewed by certain people as evidence of insufficient trepidation before the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity."

{n}The man casts an intrigued eye over you.{/n} "An interesting perspective. However, allow me to offer you a bit of advice: in the interests of your own well-being, you should frame your thoughts with greater piety. Demonstrating such a lack of care when choosing your words might be viewed by certain people as evidence of insufficient trepidation before the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity."

languages.text: {n}这个人对你投来了好奇的目光。{/n}“真是个有趣的观点。不过，请允许我给您一点点建议：您应当用更加虔诚的态度来表达您的看法，这是为了您自己的利益着想。当您选择话语时，如果您表现得不够审慎，可能会有人认为您对神皇，对人类之主心怀异心。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man casts an intrigued eye over you.{/n} "An interesting perspective. However, allow me to offer you a bit of advice: in the interests of your own well-being, you should frame your thoughts with greater piety. Demonstrating such a lack of care when choosing your words might be viewed by certain people as evidence of insufficient trepidation before the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个人对你投来了好奇的目光。{/n}“真是个有趣的观点。不过，请允许我给您一点点建议：您应当用更加虔诚的态度来表达您的看法，这是为了您自己的利益着想。当您选择话语时，如果您表现得不够审慎，可能会有人认为您对神皇，对人类之主心怀异心。”

languages.text: {n}El hombre te lanza una mirada intrigada.{/n} «Una perspectiva interesante. No obstante, permita que le ofrezca un pequeño consejo: por su propio bienestar, debería enfocar sus pensamientos con mayor fervor. Ese descuido a la hora de elegir sus palabras podría considerarse a ojos de ciertas personas como prueba de una devoción insuficiente hacia el Dios Emperador, Señor de la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: {n}The man casts an intrigued eye over you.{/n} "An interesting perspective. However, allow me to offer you a bit of advice: in the interests of your own well-being, you should frame your thoughts with greater piety. Demonstrating such a lack of care when choosing your words might be viewed by certain people as evidence of insufficient trepidation before the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre te lanza una mirada intrigada.{/n} «Una perspectiva interesante. No obstante, permita que le ofrezca un pequeño consejo: por su propio bienestar, debería enfocar sus pensamientos con mayor fervor. Ese descuido a la hora de elegir sus palabras podría considerarse a ojos de ciertas personas como prueba de una devoción insuficiente hacia el Dios Emperador, Señor de la Humanidad».

languages.text: {n}その男はあなたに興味があるような目を向ける。{/n}「興味深い見解ですね。しかし、一つ助言させてください。あなた自身のために、より敬虔な気持ちで自分の考えを構築するべきでしょう。言葉を選ぶときにそのような配慮の欠如を示すと、一部の人たちに、人類の主である神帝陛下への畏怖を欠いている証拠として捉えられるかもしれません」
languages.original_text: {n}The man casts an intrigued eye over you.{/n} "An interesting perspective. However, allow me to offer you a bit of advice: in the interests of your own well-being, you should frame your thoughts with greater piety. Demonstrating such a lack of care when choosing your words might be viewed by certain people as evidence of insufficient trepidation before the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: {n}その男はあなたに興味があるような目を向ける。{/n}「興味深い者の見方ですね。しかし、少しアドバイスさせてください。あなた自身の幸福のために、より敬虔な気持ちで自分の考えを構築するべきでしょう。言葉を選ぶときにそのような注意の欠如を示すと、一部の人たちに、人類の主である神帝陛下への畏怖を欠いている証拠として捉えられるかもしれません」
{n}その男はあなたに興味があるような目を向ける。{/n}「興味深い見解ですね。しかし、一つ助言させてください。あなた自身のために、より敬虔な気持ちで自分の考えを構築するべきでしょう。言葉を選ぶときにそのような配慮の欠如を示すと、一部の人たちに、人類の主である神帝陛下への畏怖を欠いている証拠として捉えられるかもしれません」

languages.original_text: {n}The man casts an intrigued eye over you.{/n} "An interesting perspective. However, allow me to offer you a bit of advice: in the interests of your own well-being, you should frame your thoughts with greater piety. Demonstrating such a lack of care when choosing your words might be viewed by certain people as evidence of insufficient trepidation before the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity."

languages.text: {n}L'homme vous lance un regard intrigué.{/n} « Voilà un point de vue intéressant. Permettez-moi cependant de vous donner un conseil dans l'intérêt de votre sécurité : veillez à exprimer vos opinions avec davantage de piété. Faire montre d'une telle désinvolture dans le choix de ses paroles pourrait être vu par certains comme la preuve d'un manque de dévotion à l'égard de l'Empereur-Dieu, le Maître de l'Humanité. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man casts an intrigued eye over you.{/n} "An interesting perspective. However, allow me to offer you a bit of advice: in the interests of your own well-being, you should frame your thoughts with greater piety. Demonstrating such a lack of care when choosing your words might be viewed by certain people as evidence of insufficient trepidation before the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme vous lance un regard intrigué.{/n} « Voilà un point de vue intéressant. Permettez-moi cependant de vous donner un conseil dans l'intérêt de votre sécurité : veillez à exprimer vos opinions avec davantage de piété. Faire montre d'une telle désinvolture dans le choix de ses paroles pourrait être vu par certains comme la preuve d'un manque de dévotion à l'égard de l'Empereur-Dieu, le Maître de l'humanité. »

languages.text: {n}Der Mann wirft dir einen interessierten Blick zu.{/n} "Eine interessante Sichtweise. Gestattet mir trotzdem einen Rat: Ummantelt Eure Gedanken mit Rücksicht auf Euer eigenes Wohlbefinden mit mehr Frömmigkeit. Eine derartige Nachlässigkeit im Umgang mit Worten könnten manche für einen Beweis halten, dass es Euch an Gottesfurcht vor dem Gottimperator mangelt, dem Herren der Menschheit."
languages.original_text: {n}The man casts an intrigued eye over you.{/n} "An interesting perspective. However, allow me to offer you a bit of advice: in the interests of your own well-being, you should frame your thoughts with greater piety. Demonstrating such a lack of care when choosing your words might be viewed by certain people as evidence of insufficient trepidation before the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann wirft dir einen interessierten Blick zu.{/n} "Eine interessante Sichtweise. Gestattet mir trotzdem einen Rat: Ummantelt Eure Gedanken mit Rücksicht auf Euer eigenes Wohlbefinden mit mehr Frömmigkeit. Eine derartige Nachlässigkeit im Umgang mit Worten könnten manche für einen Beweis halten, dass es Euch an Gottesfurcht vor dem Gottimperator mangelt, dem Herren der Menschheit."

languages.text: {n}Adam sana merakını cezbettiğini belirten bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "İlginç bir bakış açısı olsa da ufak bir tavsiye vermeme izin verin: Kendi iyiliğiniz için düşüncelerinizi daha dindar bir çerçevede kursanız iyi edersiniz. Sözlerinizi seçerken böylesi bir dikkatsizlik sergilemeniz bazı çevrelerce İnsanlığın Efendisi Tanrı İmparator'dan yeterince çekinmediğiniz şeklinde algılanabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}The man casts an intrigued eye over you.{/n} "An interesting perspective. However, allow me to offer you a bit of advice: in the interests of your own well-being, you should frame your thoughts with greater piety. Demonstrating such a lack of care when choosing your words might be viewed by certain people as evidence of insufficient trepidation before the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam sana merakını cezbettiğini belirten bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "İlginç bir bakış açısı olsa da ufak bir tavsiye vermeme izin verin: Kendi iyiliğiniz için düşüncelerinizi daha dindar bir çerçevede kursanız iyi edersiniz. Sözlerinizi seçerken böylesi bir dikkatsizlik sergilemeniz bazı çevrelerce İnsanlığın Efendisi Tanrı İmparator'dan yeterince çekinmediğiniz şeklinde algılanabilir."
